item.title: Windows Server Backup Event IDs
item.description: Event ID Source Message 4 Microsoft-Windows-Backup Backup finished successfully. 5 Microsoft-Windows-Backup Backup started at ‘%6’ failed with following error code ‘%2’. 8 Microsoft-Windows-Backup Backup cancelled. 9 Microsoft-Windows-Backup Backup started at ‘%1’ failed as Volume Shadow copy operation failed for backup volumes with following error code ‘%2’. 17 Microsoft-Windows-Backup Backup started at ‘%1’ failed because Windows Backup engine could not be contacted, error code ‘%2’.
